description: Listen on UDP 8125 for DogStatsD-formatted metrics. Translate those to StatsD format. Send to 8135.
name: dogstatsd-2-statsd

scripts.dist:
npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run eslint && npm run markdownlint-cli && npm run yaml-lint && echo "
Ready for submission!"
scripts.test: echo "Functional tests will be performed on GitHub via this project's workflows!" && exit 1
